book.synopsis: “The best historical novels ever written.”―Richard Snow, New York Times Book Review Patrick O’Brian’s twenty-one-volume Aubrey/Maturin series has delighted generations of devoted fans, inspired a blockbuster film, and sold millions of copies in twenty-four languages. These five omnibus volumes, beautifully produced and boxed, contain 7,000 pages of what has often been described as a single, continuous narrative. They are a perfect tribute for such a literary achievement, and a perfect gift for the O’Brian enthusiast.
book.dimensions: Height: 8.6 Inches, Length: 5.5 Inches, Weight: 10 Pounds, Width: 8.3 Inches
